name: Target Process Dark Theme
description: A Dark theme for TargetProcess 3. A public and updated theme
additional_info:
A dark theme for TP that has been extended from https://userstyles.org/styles/132767/globeteam-targetprocess-dark

Would like to keep this theme updated. The public gist can be found at, https://gist.github.com/CaptinKraken/2765be27de0f0233c92cdb6b1ae48883 . Comments, additions, and edits are welcomed.

discussions.name: Plenty of text is dark on dark in the latest version
